title: Gas
descript: A gas is a substance that has no fixed size or shape. When inside a closed container, a gas will expand to fill the container. An example of gas is the air you breathe.

title: Gas
descript: A gas is a substance that has no fixed size or shape. When inside a closed container, a gas will expand to fill the container. An example of gas is the air you breathe.

title: Liquid
descript: State of aggregation of matter in the form of a highly incompressible fluid, which means that its volume is almost constant over a large range of pressure.

title: Liquid
descript: State of aggregation of matter in the form of a highly incompressible fluid, which means that its volume is almost constant over a large range of pressure.

title: Solid
descript: This is the aggregation of the material, which is characterized by its resistance to changes in shape and volume.
